It has been decided to follow the following procedure for acceptance of bids of PPP projects: a) The evaluation of bids for award purpose will be  approved by Chairman; NHAI if the response to the bid is adequate (more than two valid bids) and the VGF is within 5% as approved by PPPAC. b) In the event there are two or less bids, the decision of the bid should be made by Board of NHAI; c) Board may accept single bid after examining the reasonableness of the same as per recommendation of the B K Chaturvedi Committee Report: d) A quarterly statement of works awarded shall be placed before the Board.
